content:
Great. Let's continue writing the article. Assist me with writing the content for Heading 6. You must write in a logical and organized manner, using subheadings, bullet points, numbering, tables, and other tools to break up the text and make it easier to read. The content should have a word count of 100-200 words. 
VIII. Signing a Deed of Novation

Requirements for signing a Deed of Novation
Implications of a poorly executed Deed of Novation

Do not give me a generic answer. You are to act as an expert construction lawyer in Australia so it must reflect in your answers and also consider the related contents we discussed in our whole conversation. Make sure to not repeat or rephrase the same idea if you already provided them in the previous section of the content. Do not end the content with a "summary" or "conclusion". I intend to tell you when you should provide them.
